headline: A Devastating Fire at a Major Ford Supplier Will Disrupt Business for Months
summary: A late-night fire leveled a key part of a New York aluminum plant in hours.  Its absence is going to disrupt business at  Ford Motor  and other automakers for months to come.  The plant’s operator, Atlanta-based Novelis, supplies about 40% of the aluminum sheet used by the auto industry in the U.S., according to industry analysts.

raw.headline: A Devastating Fire at a Major Ford Supplier Will Disrupt Business for Months
raw.summary: A late-night fire leveled a key part of a New York aluminum plant in hours.  Its absence is going to disrupt business at  Ford Motor  and other automakers for months to come.  The plant’s operator, Atlanta-based Novelis, supplies about 40% of the aluminum sheet used by the auto industry in the U.S., according to industry analysts.

headline: Trump to impose 25% tariff on trucks starting Nov. 1

headline: Lucid Motors sets record as Gravity sales pick up and tax credit expires
summary: The company has seen EV deliveries increase for seven straight quarters, even though it's still way off the ambitious goals it promoted when it went public in 2021.

headline: Trump Says US Tariffs on Heavy Truck Imports to Begin Nov. 1
summary: Trump originally said last month that heavy-duty truck levies would start Oct. 1, but that timeline slipped as officials heard appeals from companies concerned about the impact.  “Beginning November 1st, 2025, all Medium and Heavy Duty Trucks coming into the United States from other Countries will be Tariffed at the Rate of 25%,” the president posted Monday, without offering further details.  Trump’s announcement is tied to a probe launched in April by the US Commerce Department into heavy truck imports.

raw.headline: Trump Says US Tariffs on Heavy Truck Imports to Begin Nov. 1
raw.summary: Trump originally said last month that heavy-duty truck levies would start Oct. 1, but that timeline slipped as officials heard appeals from companies concerned about the impact.  “Beginning November 1st, 2025, all Medium and Heavy Duty Trucks coming into the United States from other Countries will be Tariffed at the Rate of 25%,” the president posted Monday, without offering further details.  Trump’s announcement is tied to a probe launched in April by the US Commerce Department into heavy truck imports.

headline: Discretionary Stocks Gain Steam. What the Charts Say About eBay, Ford, Jumia Technologies
summary: eBay  is quietly having a banner year in 2025, up nearly 50%.  On Friday,  eBay  completed a bullish morning star reversal, gaining over 4%.  The stock is up 28% year to date and received an upgrade from Jefferies Monday.

headline: How the Narrative Around Ford Is Evolving Amid New Analyst Targets and Industry Shifts
summary: Ford Motor stock has seen its fair value estimate tick up slightly, rising from $10.97 to $11.15 per share. Recent analyst commentary reflects shifting dynamics in the auto industry. This modest upgrade comes amid evolving views on near-term demand, industry resilience, and competitive pressures. Stay tuned to find out how you can track future updates and understand the ongoing changes in Ford’s investment outlook. What Wall Street Has Been Saying Recent analyst commentary captures the...

headline: Kerrigan Advisors Represents Hennessy Automobile Companies in Sale of Hennessy Mazda and Hennessy GMC of Atlanta
summary: ATLANTA, October 06, 2025--Kerrigan Advisors, the premier exclusive sell-side advisor and thought partner to auto dealers nationwide, represented Atlanta-based Hennessy Automobile Companies in the sale of Hennessy Mazda and Hennessy GMC in Morrow, Georgia to ALM Automotive Group. ALM Automotive Group, owned by Khush Bhatia and headquartered in Atlanta, has operated in Georgia and the Carolinas for nearly two decades.
